Uses of Interface
Conditions.Condition

  • Packages that use Condition 
    Package Description
    Commands  
    Conditions  
    Readers  

    • Uses of Condition in Commands

      Constructors in Commands with parameters of type Condition 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryCommand(Condition condition, Command todoIfTrue, Command todoIfFalse)
      A new binary command is created, with the given condition and commands.
      Iteration(Condition condition, Command command)
      A new iteration is created, with the given condition and command.

    • Uses of Condition in Conditions

      Classes in Conditions that implement Condition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicCondition
      An enumeration of all the basic conditions that can be used in programs.
      class  ComposedCondition
      A class representing conditions that consist of multiple (sub)conditions that can be evaluated together.
      class  Conjunction
      A class of composed conditions treating their subcommands as a conjunction of conditions.
      class  Disjunction
      A class of composed conditions treating their subcommands as a disjunction of conditions.
      class  EnergyAtLeastCondition
      A class representing energy-at-least conditions, conditions that check whether a robot has at least a certain amount of energy.
      class  Negation
      A class of commands representing negations of commands.
      Constructors in Conditions with parameters of type Condition 
      Constructor and Description
      Negation(Condition condition)
      Create a new negation, with the given condition as negated condition.
      Constructor parameters in Conditions with type arguments of type Condition 
      Constructor and Description
      ComposedCondition(java.util.ArrayList<Condition> conditions)
      Create a new composed condition, with the given subconditions
      Conjunction(java.util.ArrayList<Condition> conditions)
      Create a new conjunction with the given subconditions.
      Disjunction(java.util.ArrayList<Condition> conditions)
      Create a new disjunction with the given subconditions.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Condition Translater.readCondition(java.lang.String condition)
